mapper.select: select count(*) from houseinfolike where aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.delete: delete from houseinfolike where aptCode=#{aptcode} and userId =#{userid}
mapper.select: select no, hl.aptCode, userid, likeTime, aptName, dongCode, dongName, buildYear, jibun, lat, lng, img from houseinfolike hl join houseinfo h on hl.aptCode = h.aptCode where hl.userid = #{userId};
